title: Game-Based Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage skills and foundational knowledge of instructional design
context.additional_context: Exploring effective integration of commercial learning games into language education for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze commercial learning games and develop three or more strategies to align them with language education objectives.
Participants can design at least one formative assessment tool incorporating game elements and derive improvements through peer evaluation.
Educators can create lesson scenarios applying two or more commercial games to language teaching methodologies (e.g., role-play, situational dialogues).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
